revised_title: Observations on Bone Fractures and the Role of Muscles
tldr: The author discusses various cases of bone fractures caused by the power of muscles alone. They also explore the connection between bone health and scurvy, a disease that weakens the body's ability to heal. The author suggests that a mercurial salivation treatment can help cure bone diseases and improve overall bone health.
